project_description: A simple Flutter app with login and home screens using the Cubit pattern for state management.
architecture_overview: The project follows a modularized architecture with separate folders for screens, cubits, models, and widgets. State management is handled using the Cubit pattern.

files.name: lib/main.dart
files.description: Entry point of the application. Sets up the initial route and provides the AuthCubit.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main entry point of the application.

files.name: lib/screens/login_screen.dart
files.description: Defines the LoginScreen widget, which displays the login form.

files.name: lib/screens/home_screen.dart
files.description: Defines the HomeScreen widget, which displays the logout button.

files.name: lib/cubits/auth_cubit.dart
files.description: Defines the AuthCubit, which manages authentication state.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Attempts to log in with the provided email and password.

files.name: lib/models/user_model.dart
files.description: Defines the User model, which represents a user.

files.name: lib/widgets/login_form.dart
files.description: Defines the LoginForm widget, which contains the email and password fields and a login button.

files.name: lib/widgets/logout_button.dart
files.description: Defines the LogoutButton widget, which logs out the user when pressed.

widgets.name: LoginForm
widgets.description: Contains the email and password fields and a login button.

widgets.name: LogoutButton
widgets.description: Logs out the user when pressed.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Attempts to log in with the provided email and password.

dependencies.name: flutter
dependencies.purpose: Flutter framework for building the app.

dependencies.name: flutter_bloc
dependencies.purpose: State management using the Cubit pattern.

sequence_diagram:
@startuml
actor User
User -> LoginScreen: open
LoginScreen -> AuthCubit: login(email, password)
AuthCubit -> HomeScreen: emit Authenticated
User -> HomeScreen: open
HomeScreen -> AuthCubit: logout
AuthCubit -> LoginScreen: emit Unauthenticated
@enduml
state_management_flow: State is managed using the Cubit pattern. The AuthCubit handles login and logout actions, emitting Authenticated and Unauthenticated states, respectively. The LoginScreen listens to the AuthCubit's states and navigates to the HomeScreen upon successful login. The HomeScreen listens to the AuthCubit's states and navigates back to the LoginScreen upon logout.
navigation_flow: The app starts with the LoginScreen. Upon successful login, the user is navigated to the HomeScreen. From the HomeScreen, the user can log out, which navigates them back to the LoginScreen.

pubspec_yaml.name: simple_auth_app
pubspec_yaml.description: A simple Flutter app with login and home screens using the Cubit pattern for state management.
